newsitem.title: UK: Armour Trust in talks that may lead to offer.
newsitem.headline: Armour Trust in talks that may lead to offer.

text.p: British household goods group Armour Trust Plc said on Wednesday it had received an approach and was in talks which could lead to an offer being made.
A further announcement would be made in due course.

The group also said pre-tax profits for the year to May 2, 1997 would be "well below current market expectations largely due to the incidence of exceptional and non-recurring expenses in relation to acquisitions and disposals".
The personal care division also put in a poor performance, it said in a statement.
The share price fell 2-1/4p to 23-3/4p on the statement.
